languages.text: {n}Кибелла смеется — счастливо и легко, как вы никогда не слышали раньше.{/n} "Завет Паутины остался за спиной — к чему думать о том, что отступило в прошлое? Возьми меня за руку — время омыть себя от праха минувшего и вступить в грядущее".

{n}Kibellah laughs with a light-heartedness you have not heard from her before.{/n} "The Tenets of the Web are behind me — so, why think about something that's already gone? Take my hand — let us wash ourselves clean of the ashes of the past and step into the future."
languages.original_text: {n}Кибелла смеется — счастливо и легко, как вы никогда не слышали раньше.{/n} "Завет Паутины остался за спиной — к чему думать о том, что отступило в прошлое? Возьми меня за руку — время омыть себя от праха минувшего и вступить в грядущее".

{n}Kibellah laughs with a light-heartedness you have not heard from her before.{/n} "The Tenets of the Web are behind me — so, why think about something that's already gone? Take my hand — let us wash ourselves clean of the ashes of the past and step into the future."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah se ríe con una ligereza que nunca antes habías oído de sus labios.{/n} «He dejado atrás la Doctrina de la Red. ¿Por qué pensar en algo que ya no está? Toma mi mano. Lavémonos las cenizas del pasado y caminemos hacia el futuro».
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah laughs with a light-heartedness you have not heard from her before.{/n} "The Tenets of the Web are behind me — so, why think about something that's already gone? Take my hand — let us wash ourselves clean of the ashes of the past and step into the future."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah se ríe con una ligereza que nunca antes habías oído de sus labios.{/n} «He dejado atrás la Doctrina de la Red. ¿Por qué pensar en algo que ya no está? Toma mi mano. Lavémonos las cenizas del pasado y caminemos hacia el futuro».

languages.text: {n}キベラは今までに聞いたことのないような軽快さで笑う。{/n}「ウェブの教義は私の後ろにいる。それで、どうしていなくなってしまったものについて考えるの？私の手を取り…過去の灰を洗い流して、未来へと踏み出しましょう」
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah laughs with a light-heartedness you have not heard from her before.{/n} "The Tenets of the Web are behind me — so, why think about something that's already gone? Take my hand — let us wash ourselves clean of the ashes of the past and step into the future."

traits.locale_text: {n}キベラは今までに聞いたことのないような軽快さで笑う。{/n}「ウェブの教義は私の後ろにいる。それで、どうしていなくなってしまったものについて考えるの？私の手を取り…過去の灰を洗い流して、未来へと踏み出しましょう」

languages.text: {n}绮贝菈轻松地笑了起来，你以前从来没听过她这样的笑声。{/n}“那些教义已经被我抛在脑后了，既然如此，为什么还要去想那些已经消散的东西呢？牵着我的手，让我们洗净来自过去的灰烬，迈向未来吧。”
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah laughs with a light-heartedness you have not heard from her before.{/n} "The Tenets of the Web are behind me — so, why think about something that's already gone? Take my hand — let us wash ourselves clean of the ashes of the past and step into the future."

traits.locale_text: {n}绮贝菈轻松地笑了起来，你以前从来没听过她这样的笑声。{/n}“那些教义已经被我抛在脑后了，既然如此，为什么还要去想那些已经消散的东西呢？牵着我的手，让我们洗净来自过去的灰烬，迈向未来吧。”

languages.text: {n}Kibellah lacht mit einer Unbeschwertheit, die du bei ihr noch nie gehört hast.{/n} "Die Grundsätze des Netzes liegen hinter mir – warum sollte ich an etwas denken, das bereits Vergangenheit ist? Nehmt meine Hand – waschen wir uns rein von der Asche der Vergangenheit, und betreten wir die Zukunft."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah laughs with a light-heartedness you have not heard from her before.{/n} "The Tenets of the Web are behind me — so, why think about something that's already gone? Take my hand — let us wash ourselves clean of the ashes of the past and step into the future."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah lacht mit einer Unbeschwertheit, die du bei ihr noch nie gehört hast.{/n} "Die Grundsätze des Netzes liegen hinter mir – warum sollte ich an etwas denken, das bereits Vergangenheit ist? Nehmt meine Hand – waschen wir uns rein von der Asche der Vergangenheit, und betreten wir die Zukunft."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah rit avec une légèreté que vous ne lui aviez encore jamais entendue.{/n} « Les Préceptes de la Toile sont derrière moi, alors pourquoi ressasser ce qui n'est déjà plus ? Prenez ma main, débarrassons-nous des cendres du passé et entrons de plain-pied dans l'avenir. »
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah laughs with a light-heartedness you have not heard from her before.{/n} "The Tenets of the Web are behind me — so, why think about something that's already gone? Take my hand — let us wash ourselves clean of the ashes of the past and step into the future."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah rit avec une légèreté que vous ne lui aviez encore jamais entendue.{/n} « Les Préceptes de la Toile sont derrière moi, alors pourquoi ressasser ce qui n'est déjà plus ? Prenez ma main, débarrassons-nous des cendres du passé et entrons de plain-pied dans l'avenir. »

languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah laughs with a light-heartedness you have not heard from her before.{/n} "The Tenets of the Web are behind me — so, why think about something that's already gone? Take my hand — let us wash ourselves clean of the ashes of the past and step into the future."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah, daha önce hiç duymadığın bir gamsızlıkla kahkaha atıyor.{/n} "Ağ'ın İlkeleri'ni ardımda bıraktım. Hâlihazırda geçmişe karışmış bir şey üzerine düşünmenin ne manası var? Elimi tut. Geçmişin küllerinden kendimizi arındırıp geleceğe doğru adım atalım."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah laughs with a light-heartedness you have not heard from her before.{/n} "The Tenets of the Web are behind me — so, why think about something that's already gone? Take my hand — let us wash ourselves clean of the ashes of the past and step into the future."
